title: Air Tindi

r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $6.7M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with Air Tindi. The average
  contract duration was 0.28 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $101.3K. The longest
  contract was 3.1 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $7.4M.
lookup_name: 'AIR TINDI'
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '6.7M'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts: '180'
s431_number_of_contracts_with_amendments: '8'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '4%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage: '94%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments: '1.25'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value: '157.9K'
s424_mean_duration: '0.28'
s421_mean_contract_value: '101.3K'
s425_max_duration: '3.1'
s422_max_contract_value: '7.4M'
